website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for the LEGO or Star Wars fan, young or old.
pros: The Advent calendar features quality LEGO-brand pieces each day up until Christmas
The box also acts as a background scene for playing with the newly discovered figures and pieces
Set includes figures, weapons, and vehicles
cons: Fairly expensive, and tabs can be tough for little kids to open

customer_reviews.title: It's the same 'ol thing.
customer_reviews.text: I get this every year for my kids. There aren't a lot of new or different pieces. It would be nice to see things they can't get in other sets or from previous years. If you are getting this for the first time, it may be more fun.
customer_reviews.author: genovese 1

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good year!
customer_reviews.text: I usually alternate between Lego City and Lego Star Wars each year for the advent calendar. But the picks this year for Star Wars put it over the top. Between Poe's X-Wing and the Santa Porg, and the gift-droid, I'm excited to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Glass

customer_reviews.title: Fun times to be had
customer_reviews.text: If you take Lego-Expensive for what you get out of the equation and add some daily fun, Star Wars, and a countdown, you pretty much can't go wrong with this. My 5 year old is sure to love this. I will update it with photos if she tells me I am wrong and throws them at me, laughs, and returns to the yard to run around with pointed sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Allred

customer_reviews.title: Oily boxes!
customer_reviews.text: Can't really write one as it is for Christmas but I bought 4 calendars all different and when I opened the outer box all the boxes had a thin film of oil covering them, very odd! I cleaned the boxes and they seem to be okay but quite strange 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: cool toy for all ages (including the father of the child it was given to)
customer_reviews.text: have given Lego Star Wars toys to several of my favorite kids for a couple of years. They love it. The father of one of the kids is a big fan of the toy also. well made toy, and will last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas, Star Wars and Lego-Fun Perfected
customer_reviews.text: My boys get a Lego Advent Calendar every year from our Elf. The boys love opening a mini set every day leading to Christmas and it fun to see what surprise Star Wars creation Lego comes up with every day. I’ve learned to buy them as soon as they are released because they sell out (especially the Star Wars version) and then resellers mark up the price.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.E

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it for the price. The legos inside are mostly blobs that are supposed to be some kind of spaceship (even using the visual to build it). The cardboard comes apart easily and many of the doors open early. There’s only 5 mini figures in the whole thing, if you have multiple kids opening it causes fights because one kid got a cool figure and the others got a blob of a “spaceship”. Get a reusable one and fill it with Star Wars mini figures for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: mlock

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait til Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My son has wished for and received these Lego Star Wars Advent calendars for several years now. He really looks forward to opening and assembling a new tiny set or figure every day during Christmastime!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic way to prepare for Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this! Our third year doing it, and it worked as an appeasement and reward, with him being patient about waiting for Christmas and making sure to only open the right one on the right day. A great assortment of mini-figures and micro shops. The miniature Hoth base was my favorite. The porg with a Christmas hat and the present droid was his. Looking forward to getting next Christmas’
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Pursell

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst Star Wars Advent calendars we had so far
customer_reviews.text: Having have had Star Wars Advent Calendars before, i can honestly say, this was a waste of money. I got it when it was on sale, so i am not too mad about it but-- half of the items in there,you cant even tell what they are supposed to be. Its not taht my son doesng know how to put legos together, he is a lego addict, but these legos....besides the actual figures, most if the items you cant tell what its supposed to be. Disappointed for sure, next year i will make sure to spend the exrra money again on the other star wars advent calendar option.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Z.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my daughters adult (23 year old) boyfriend, since he loves Star Wars, he was so excited upon receiving it and while it's only day 2 into the advent, he is loving opening the doors/packages everyday, today he got a space ship. Great advent calendar for all ages and shipping was super fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for any age!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 48 and got this for myself and having fun with it! Some are better than others, but same goes with candy Advent calendars. Note the assembly instructions are inside each flap. Took me a while to figure that out. And several packets have extra parts. Better than the other way, but might confuse some kids. I'm on day 7 and have a pile going. Will try to make something at the end with all of them. :)
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Very fun for kids, teens, & adults
customer_reviews.text: My son is 14 so I figured this would be to little kid for him. I bought is expecting him to not really be in to is as he no longer plays with legos. He loved it and I think because they are small and can be assembled fast he got into it during the holidays. My big kid aka husband liked it too so I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LuvMyMeds

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this one instead of the regular one this year, the instructions were sketchy at best, despite us being a LEGO family and half the things we were like “what the hell is this!?!!!?!!” Seriously the only thing we looked forward to was the minifigs because that was the only ones we could figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Some Kits aren’t recognizable and instructions hard to follow. Expecting more quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the kits aren’t recognizable and instructions are hard to follow. I was expecting more quality for the price. Other pieces were ok, although it would be nice if the kits vary from the previous year were more different. If you get LEGO Star Wars Advent Calendar every year you would get disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Legos. Star wars. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.text: There are legos. And they are Star Wars legos. That is all you need to know. These are very small mini-builds for each day, but a lot of bite-sized fun. My 10 year old son loves this, we did the Lego Star Wars calendar last year as well, and he looks forward to this every year.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Larson

customer_reviews.title: The last day was missing!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted the Porg. More than anything else. It was the last day and when we got there it was empty!!! Lego sent a new one a month later missing parts. Porg only has one wing. Also the simple directions are terrible. Many times I needed more information to put something together.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: For the Lego Star Wars fan!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a Lego Star Wars collector and he enjoys getting them every year! They are very tiny and pieces even tinier, so need nimble fingers to assemble. Assembly instructions come on the inside of each door for each piece and the box becomes a display for the figures.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not a good year 2019
customer_reviews.text: I hate this for my kid every year for the last few years. This year it seems almost cheaper. I can’t quite explain it. But each piece we’ve opened up so far have been a disappointment. Some items we didn’t even know what they were. We’ve always been a fan of that Lego advent calendars, but this 2019 one was a thumbs down from us.
customer_reviews.author: MyahBee

customer_reviews.title: for anyone that loves Star Wars to play & display
customer_reviews.text: Love it been giving it to our grandson ever since it came out! as always best service and best price looking forward to next year's model
customer_reviews.author: william perschall

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Husband.
customer_reviews.text: A friend said she was going to get one for her son and I thought what a great idea for my husband, a real big kid (lol). Any Hoo, he loved it and and so did my friend's son. They are really fun, and much better quality than I was expecting. Good value I think too.
customer_reviews.author: gingerbee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My "adult" sons still enjoy receiving this Star Wars Advent calendar. Cute minifigs and holiday infused pieces. The regular Lego Advent Calendar is awesome too. A great tradition to have every year. We save the insert for future use in sorting Lego pieces too.
customer_reviews.author: wmom88

customer_reviews.title: A yearly must have
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these advent calendars. Definitely far better than the old chalky chocolate type I had growing up. She’s 12 and still looks forward to these every year. We’ve been getting these the last 5 years and will continue to.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Advent Season
customer_reviews.text: We used this for the Advent season in our home and it was perfect for stopping those little "how many more days until Christmas" questions and gave everyone soemthing to look forward to. Well packaged, cute outlay, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Usher

customer_reviews.title: so good!
customer_reviews.text: my wife and I love these as much as our 5yo! We all know LEGO is expensive but kids LOVE small builds and at less than $1.50 per build it's a bargain! Sure, we are spoiling our kid with 24 LEGO builds in a month but it's so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: J. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good concept. Mediocre execution
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and some of the kits are nice. But others are kinda lame and your can't even tell what they are. Instructions are hard to follow for little ones. Love the concept but the execution could be better
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kite

customer_reviews.title: Arrived partially opened
customer_reviews.text: Received Advent Calendar and box was crushed on one side and several of the numbered doors were busted open. Very disappointed. Had to take back closed to give to my son. The legos he has opened thus far have not been as thrilling as he would like. There was only really one he really likes that was a spaceship he plays with daily. Would have loved to have received in perfect condition without the days being half opened upon receipt, kind of takes the fun out of it did him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Star Wars advent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third edition we've purchased in recent years. The nine year old was so excited to open a door each morning! Some of the figures seemed random but overall very happy with it. I look forward to next year's edition
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A gift for all of us
customer_reviews.text: I have bought it or a similar on since my nephew was two. He is now twelve and I thought this year he was perhaps too old for this gift. I contacted his dad in November to and asked if I should send something else. I was told to please continue sending the LEGO advent calendar it begins the holidays every year for the child and he would be disappointed to out grow it! Made me feel go, so it’s a gift for all of us :-)
customer_reviews.author: Clair Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Passable play toy, but not repeatable purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, Lego has a lock on buildable advent calendars. But the toys are extremely small and hardly more than 1x1 bricks for 80% of dailies. A rather disappointing box. Almost as sad as the ornament version last year.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The advent event in our house.
customer_reviews.text: Always a great advent event. The models are well thought out with a clever economy of pieces. The kids loved opening a window a day. Just fun. And afterwards You have tiny space ships to play with and of course, minifigs.
customer_reviews.author: stevenpirie

customer_reviews.title: It's a tradition that my grandsons love.
customer_reviews.text: I have given Lego Starwars Advent calendars to my grandsons for years. I learned the hard way to order them early. The price goes up quickly by Thanksgiving. They absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Lame, more or less.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the stuff is just lame. Our 4 year old loves Star Wars, but after the first week of his disappointment, we ended up buying him the Marvel Funko POP Advent Calendar. I would recommend this for only the adult Star Wars fan that will buy anything Star Wars regardless of what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Triana Clan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: this was my grandson's introduction for legos. He loved it. Small pieces easily put together ... he is 7 and made him interested in doing more Legos. Was very happy with the small toys that came with it every day. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MOM2SIX

customer_reviews.title: It is the way
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was $10 cheaper than B&N and a good mini fig value. I took back the more expensive one to b&n and bought this one on Amazon. Wish it had Mandalorian bits
customer_reviews.author: Craig A.

customer_reviews.title: Get this for my sons every year, they're grown ups now and still love it
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like getting a little gift every day? My sons who are in their 20's now still get a little lift by putting together a lego piece every day between Thanksgiving and Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineAndRain

customer_reviews.title: May the Force be with you.
customer_reviews.text: This our family tradition. We love this Advent calendar. (Yes, we're nerds.) Been doing this for years. Next year we'll do a little tree and use these as ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: JPulley

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren look forward to this each Advent
customer_reviews.text: It has become a tradition that I give this yearly to my grandchildren. Even though they are getting older (two in high school), they hope I will continue the tradition
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful alternative to chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an avid Star Wars fan. He is 37. Big kid at heart with 2 small sons, ages 4 & 2. Guess who has more fun and opened it every morning through December.
customer_reviews.author: dawnyfox

customer_reviews.title: Star Fans will love it
customer_reviews.text: We buy this every year and every year it is different and enjoyable. A nice collection of mini figs and items to build. A Star Wars fan will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEGO fun every day!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun every day! I must be dumb because it took me 10 min to figure out how to open the box properly - which is very important in this case!
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Neither Christmassy not Star Warsy.
customer_reviews.text: It was neither Star Warsy nor Christmassy. I feel like whoever made this set had never seen the movies. I'm a pretty major fan, seen all the movies, read the comics, played the games... And I honestly can't identify half of these. It's just another ship. Very disappointed, will not be purchasing again. On the flip side, I also purchased a Harry Potter one for my wife, and that one was great! Very Christmassy, and very Harry pottery!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Some of the days were hard for son to put together due to only being able to look at pic and having no instructions. I didn't think it was really worth price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Happy Lego Star Wars Fan
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old is having a ton of fun with this Advent Calendar. We had a mishap on Day 4, it had missing pieces. Emailed LEGO and they responded they will be replacing the contents for Day 4. He's enjoying seeing the different characters, ships and droids.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Doran

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar and everyday is a surprise
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing event calendar. My son loved getting something each day in anticipation of Christmas. Everything was easy to put together and the miniature versions of the ships were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: annamcbride44

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable family fun !
customer_reviews.text: I have done Lego advent calendars for a few years now for my grandkids . They always enjoy it and I look forward to seeing their faces ! A great way to spend a few minutes each day together !
customer_reviews.author: Mary Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for ⭐️ Wars fans
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these. There were some clever figures. The directions were so tiny though. Hard for mom to see and help. Luckily my son knew what he was doing. And seeing.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Swift

customer_reviews.title: You literally get 24 Lego present to count down the days til Xmas!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a Lego advent calendar for a couple of friends as kind of a "shared" gift for all of us (they send me pics of each one, if I'm not there) to count down the days til xmas, and it's always a hit! It would be cool if there was something that identified each day's gift/ character. It's pretty pricey, but that's to be expected for Lego product. Bottom line: FUN
customer_reviews.author: Lil Quaners

customer_reviews.title: Quality control lacking
customer_reviews.text: Update: Lego sent us the missing piece and were great to work with. I've updated my review. My son is enjoying this calendar. So far, my son has received two Chewbacca s when one of them should have been a star destroyer. Naturally, he was really looking forward to opening the star destroyer. These are too pricey to not receive what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome advent calendar.
customer_reviews.text: I buy the star wars Christmas set every year and it never dissapoints. They have a nice mix of characters, ships, and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Peavey

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love lego. These are the best advent calendars. Way better than candy. Star wars, lego and holiday. Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: Magmore

customer_reviews.title: Great kids gifts
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 different calendars for Christmas gifts for great grandchildren. They look forward to getting them at Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: J. CLARK

customer_reviews.title: Great set for Lego lovers
customer_reviews.text: These sets are great - the amount of detail they can include in such small models is amazing. Fun to put together and includes lots of spare parts! It IS a little expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: UMS

customer_reviews.title: Cool Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves the Lego advent calendar! Buying from Amazon means we don't have to search for it in retail!
customer_reviews.author: Rob L

customer_reviews.title: There was a duplicate
customer_reviews.text: There was a duplicate and wrong Lego in one of the windows. Too much little extras.. otherwise it is Star Wars and Lego and an Advent calendar all in one 🙂
customer_reviews.author: A. T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: Second year in a row I ordered a lego advent calendar for my great nephew. He loved this and looked forward to putting together a piece at a time. He is 8
customer_reviews.author: Karen Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Lego Star Wars Christmas Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Not much else to say, but this is a must for any fan of Lego and Star Wars. It should be noted that there are extra pieces in almost every day's pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. My 6yo daughter enjoys opening up a new one everyday. She put together her first one all by herself and was super happy to be able to do it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana_GM

customer_reviews.title: Star wars
customer_reviews.text: I like making my grandsons happy and the oldest one is happy he cant wait to show me what he made each day.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandsons.
customer_reviews.text: I get these for my grandsons every year for Christmas. It's a pretty good pre Christmas gift. They and their dad love them. Nice collectors items. And just kinda fun in general. Doesn't matter the age.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nielson

customer_reviews.title: First advent calendar since I was a kid.  Been a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.text: I definitely prefer the minifigures, but it's fun to assemble something little and simple each day.
customer_reviews.author: Crage Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put together. Tons and tons and tons of pieces who look exactly alike
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Christmas for my 14-year-old son who loves Legos. He has not even finished putting it together and it is now March. He does not like it
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 17 year old son for his advent calendar and he absolutely went crazy over it.
customer_reviews.author: cdcdk

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 grand kids look forward to receiving this on Thanksgiving night, all wrapped up with a tag saying "Open Dec. 1st". They are all Star Wars fans and love opening the doors each day and finding a new Lego character to put together. Been gifting this to them for many years. The panel on the box creates a scene to place all the characters.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reutlinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Star Wars Lego fan.
customer_reviews.text: Great early Christmas gift. Fun to open and assemble a little gift every day in December. Would do again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Porter

customer_reviews.title: Out of order
customer_reviews.text: On day 5, the item in the window was not matching the instructions on the flap. It was out of order. We just dealt with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the advent calendar, he is 6. Would recommend to any kid who likes Star Wars
customer_reviews.author: Luke Moore

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good fun.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, and some of the days aren't very imaginative. But overall a nice December gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ba Ba

customer_reviews.title: Perfect advent calendar.
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever. No more candy or wasted nick-nacks for this boy. He looked forward to each item - creating sharing and adding to his current collection
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra FitzRoy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had one excited 9 year old! He can’t wait to open one every day. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Fun LEGO
customer_reviews.text: These LEGO advent calendars are a little expensive, but I get one every year for my grandson. He enjoys putting one together each day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A lot for the money
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for my son to open, and mischief healthier than candy. If you buy legos you know this is a great price for how many toys you get:
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lako

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Given to my 9 year old and 7 year old nephews. Was the hit of the season. They said it was hard to wait to open them, which is the whole point of advent season. So liked that I could work that faith message in on a secular gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for one of my sons... he enjoys being surprised each day of Advent and loves Star Wars!
customer_reviews.author: eml

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother in law as a Christmas gift and gave it to him at thanksgivings. He loves it! Perfect for any Star Wars fan. It makes a unique Christmas gift 🎁
customer_reviews.author: Lana Cromer

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is the first advent calendar he has not ripped through in a single sitting. He looks forward to his daily LEGO toy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great Star Wars advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute advent calendar by LEGO. It was made like previous years so it was exactly as we expected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Package hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to get each one out. Ended up tearing the box up to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Jw1722

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun. You get a small build each day. Worth it for your LEGO lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Advent Calanedar
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year for my grandchildren. It gives them such joy to see what they are getting each day. And since they love Star Wars, this is perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 5-year-old Star Wars fan
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old grandson loves his calendar. Every item has been a winner. There's an assembly diagram on the back of each door.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Owens

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased the Lego starwars advent calendar every yr for the past 3 yrs. Our 4yr looks forward to opening it every yr at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great Star Wars LEGO
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoyed the Star Wars legos. It has been a great game for him since he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars is always a good Winner
customer_reviews.text: Our son and grandson just love this. Also, it always has some mini figs that are one of a kind.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Logue

customer_reviews.title: Its Star Wars
customer_reviews.text: Son still like it as a Teenager which is surprising. A little pricey as its Star Wars but it makes son happy.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Son likes it, our first year starting and advent tradition this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My son & grand kids are super Star Wars fanatics. They loved it!!!! The parts were used to construct another scene.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Carey

customer_reviews.title: Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My son is now 18 and still enjoy receiving these before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: mom2002

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone...
customer_reviews.text: It's yearly tradition for my daughters birthday. She LOVES getting this every year and has trouble waiting until December to open them!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Elder

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to the chocolate advent calendar. Great pieces each day. My son loves it. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Better than candy
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this Advent calendar! He has fun showing me a new treasure every day!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with the 6 year old grandson! I'm glad I purchased it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made great Advent fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift and the whole family loved it
customer_reviews.author: Teo

customer_reviews.title: Great Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves this advent calendar. He builds a new star wars item each day.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Star Wars and LEGO fans.
customer_reviews.text: My step-son loves Star Wars and Legos so this was a perfect advent calendar for him. He didn’t want to wait for the next day to open the next item. Great present.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Parslow

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons who love Star Wars. They really enjoyed the count down to Christmas. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Schenck

customer_reviews.title: Box looks to be near mint condition
customer_reviews.text: Box is in great condition. Thank you. I have gotten a couple beat up boxes from other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: jbucher

customer_reviews.title: Fun tradition for kids
customer_reviews.text: First box arrived damaged, but we were able to get a replacement a few days after advent started. This is the third year we have done a Lego calendar and have loved them all.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for Christmas with Star Wars.
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids look forward to these calendars every year!

customer_reviews.title: Super coolio!!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing in a small package! The boys love it. Better than the chocolate ones, they have told me.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars Advent Calendar 75245 Holiday Gift Set Building Kit with Star Wars Minifigure Characters (280 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Celebrate the Christmas countdown with the 75245 LEGO Star Wars 2019 Advent Calendar. Behind each door is a LEGO brick character, starship model, vehicle and other Star Wars collectibles, plus 2 exclusive, Christmas-themed Star Wars action figures. When all the doors have been opened, there's even a foldout playmat with colorful Ahch-To Island scene for kids to explore imaginative play and act out epic Star Wars adventures. Holiday gifts for kids can't get any better than this Star Wars Christmas building kit. It is a fun way to get fans of all ages excited about the holidays.
feature_bullets: Countdown to Christmas with this 2019 LEGO Star Wars Advent Calendar. With this holiday gift set, children can open a door each day to discover a fun model of their favorite Star Wars characters, vehicle, locations and more

This 280-piece Christmas & holiday gift idea includes 24 buildable LEGO characters action minifigures, exciting vehicles and starship models to collect, plus a selection of blaster weapons and a foldout playmat to get the creative play started right away

This LEGO Star Wars 2019 Advent Calendar features character minifigures, vehicles, starships, locations and more from the legendary Star Wars universe. Along with 2 exclusive, Christmas-themed Star Wars figures
Boys and girls ages 6+ will enjoy waking up to this LEGO holiday set with lots of original LEGO building bricks for endless creative play

Kids will instantly recognize Star Wars figures like Luke Skywalker, Chewbacca, Naboo Starfighter, and Poe’s X-wing and will enjoy exploring action-packed play with the festive-themed porg and Gonk Droid LEGO figures
